remarks: The supremum of a nonempty bounded set of reals is less than or equal to an upper bound.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2014.)
statement:
suprleub $p |- ( ( ( A C_ RR /\ A =/= (/) /\ E. x e. RR A. y e. A y <_ x ) /\ B e. RR ) -> ( sup ( A , RR , < ) <_ B <-> A. z e. A z <_ B ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d A z $.
$d B z $.
